TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TcpState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the states of a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState Closed = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState CloseWait = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is waiting for a connection termination request from the local user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState Closing = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is waiting for an acknowledgement of the connection termination request sent previously.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState DeleteTcb = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The transmission control buffer (TCB) for the TCP connection is being deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState Established = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The TCP handshake is complete. The connection has been established and data can be sent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState FinWait1 = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is waiting for a connection termination request from the remote endpoint or for an acknowledgement of the connection termination request sent previously.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState FinWait2 = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is waiting for a connection termination request from the remote endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState LastAck = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is waiting for the final acknowledgement of the connection termination request sent previously.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState Listen = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is listening for a connection request from any remote endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState SynReceived = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection has sent and received a connection request and is waiting for an acknowledgment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState SynSent = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection has sent the remote endpoint a segment header with the synchronize (SYN) control bit set and is waiting for a matching connection request.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState TimeWait = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The local endpoint of the TCP connection is waiting for enough time to pass to ensure that the remote endpoint received the acknowledgement of its connection termination request.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpState Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The TCP connection state is unknown.
